Race.SpecificTitle: City of Gonzales -- 1/2% Tax - CC - Perp.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Gonzales, State of Louisiana (the "City") be authorized to levy and collect a tax of one-half of one percent (1/2%) (an estimated $3,500,000.00 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year) (the "Tax"), upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the City, to commence January 1, 2018, and continue in perpetuity, with the net proceeds of the Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary costs and expenses of collection and administering the Tax) to be dedicated and used for the purposes of (i) maintaining and improving fire and police protection, and (ii) the construction, operation and maintenance of (a) a new Civic Center to be used in times of emergency and disaster recovery, and (b) a Community Outreach Building to host safe activities for youth, with any excess to be dedicated to enhancing public safety and protection, including, but not limited to, construction of capital improvements related thereto?
